articles.author: Wilhelmine Preussen
articles.title: ‘Treason!’ Wagner boss slams Russia’s military leaders - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: They want to ‘destroy’ Wagner, says Yevgeny Prigozhin about Russia’s defense minister and army chief.
articles.content:
A feud in the Russian military is beginning to boil over. 
Yevgeny Prigozhin, founder of the private Wagner Group, has claimed that the Russian defense minister, Sergei Shoigu, and the chief of the … [+1399 chars]

articles.title: China and Europe team up on tests before joint space mission in 2025 - South China Morning Post
articles.description: It marks first time a satellite made in China is shipped to European Space Agency, and for a Chinese team to help assemble and test at an ESA facility.
